item.title: Why Trump should forget about corporate tax cuts in his first 100 days
item.description: Corporate tax cuts are inflationary and could spell trouble for Republicans in the 2026 election.

item.title: Tesla’s ‘Trump bump’ fades as stock falls alongside rest of EV sector

item.title: Trump may use Medicaid cuts to fund tax reform. These states would be hit hardest.
item.description: President Donald Trump has long proposed cutting Medicaid, which covers healthcare for lower-income Americans.
